0.name: Day Trading Attention: How to Actually Build Brand and Sales in the New Social Media World
0.author: Gary Vaynerchuk
0.summary: “One thing I've learned being around Gary for the last decade is that when he sees new consumer trends or new best practices in marketing, people should listen and act on them.” — Michael Rubin, CEO of Fanatics
